Event: Epoque 2013 | Techno Cultural Fest 

Epoque 2013 is Organised by: Krishna Institute of Engineering and Technology, Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh 

Epoque 2013 dates: 
Fest dates: 20th-21st March 2015 
Last Dates for Registration: 10th March 2015 

Details: 
The Word Epoque Denotes An Age Rich With Culture And Art, An Era Of Elegance And Gaiety. Epoque Is An Attempt To Create Its Minor Replica In Krishna Institute Of Engineering and Technology, For Reliving Our Rich Culture Year After Year With Innovation Getting Enhanced With Ligament (Youth) Of New Imagination. The Legacy Of 13 Km Stone Is Rejuvenating Sabbatical After A Break Of Meticulous Learning. A Spicy Blend Of Technical Expo And Rejoicing Cultural Events, Which Creates The Saga Of Enthralling Happenings For Young Brains
